lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I live in Quito, though I am a North American.  Seeing so much poverty first hand in Ecuador, I wanted to do a small part to help someone who is making a go!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with our son and daughter.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.occupational_info: Musician and teacher

lenders.name: Charmayne & Charles
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to do more, but never felt that I had the money or means to do so.  When you're not as wealthy as Bill Gates or Oprah,  I felt that I wasn't really making a contributuion.  But after seeing this website, I know that I can make a contribution and impact lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Esthetician.  I promote skin care health.  I'm licensed in waxing,(hair removal) and make up application.  I love to make people look and feel good.  Charles is an officer in the US Army, he is stationed at the Pentagon

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: this life is a long-term game.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies with a lot of money make a lot more money.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to actually make an impact without being rich.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Electrical Engineer but my passions are living a Christian Life and Motorcycles.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Artist who works with mixed metals and glass to create  my own line of jewelry.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to get involved in areas of the world that need a little extra help.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. It does good. It is good.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach sustainable construction practices to university students in the states & offer time & service to the Eden Campus, Africa's first green business school (www.EdenCampus.co.za),

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to invest in someone's future.

lenders.name: Olalekan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are less privileged than me. I am amazed than the little I can give can impact someone's life so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a government organization where I help people solve computer related problems in order that they can do their work successfully.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: make great strides... leave small footprints
lenders.occupational_info: i buy construction services.

lenders.name: Barbara&Adam
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people around the world!

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I could not have made it through this life without the kindness and generosity of others.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the craft business for almost 30 years.  It's given me the opportunity to be a work-at-home mom.  Helping someone who 'loves' fabrics and textiles as much as I do is very heartwarming.  I learned about KIVA on Oprah and thought it was a very worthwhile organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 'professional crafter'.  I began doing craft shows selling hand made baby decor and moved onto country home accessories about 20 years ago.  I opened my first website about 5 years ago.

lenders.name: Edie
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed to have a wonderful  and virtually carefree life, perhaps because I definitely know that only through some form of service and giving is true happiness on this planet possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer in prison, sharing that when we begin to know who we truly are, do we feel any kind of fulfillment.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good inside.:)

lenders.name: Summer and Rob Belloni
lenders.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info:
Summer - Teacher
Rob - IT Analyst

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I love to help fellow entrepreneurs get their businesses off the ground. And to give people a hand when they need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people attain wellness, reach their goals and maintain good health with good habits and nutritional supplements.

lenders.name: Gwendolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities by simply being born in this country and I would like to support the efforts of others who would like to advance their station in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate Respiratory Therapist's for a major healthcare organization. It is rewarding work. I put together in-services and lecture on trends that affect our profession.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I believe Kiva is providing an amazing opportunity and moreover a right for men and women around the world to take control of both their lives and the well being of their families.  Despite political and economic strife in many of the participating Kiva countries, goals can be achieved and dreams  realized with the help of this program. People like myself can help those who also want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the wine industry in Canada. The company both owns and acts as agents for wineries around the world. My contribution involves taking these wines to market and selling them to restaurant chains across the country. This is one reason I am interested in loaning in the agriculture and farming sectors as well as retail. In our industry the land and grape growers are an integral part in the success and growth of our company. I believe that sustainable farming practices can have a multitude of benefits in developing areas. I am so thrilled to play a small part in this brilliant program.

lenders.name: annie
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: to be retired does not mean to do nothing. I just don't get paid now! My time is spent primarily on family and friends.

lenders.name: Tarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my success with others who work hard and may not have the same opportunities that I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an oil and gas company that drills wells for natural gas.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I think we are all connected in this world.  I want to help someone make a better life for their children.

lenders.name: Burt
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that i have the power to improve people's lives.

lenders.name: Oma
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel warm and fuzzy
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired from the legal profession.  I spend most of my time in my herb and vegetable garden.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We all need to do our part and set a good example for our children.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to help people all over the world.

lenders.name: Chi-Chi
lenders.occupational_info: I perform and teach classical music.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a single entrepreneur bone in my body. I admire people that under hardship  carve an existence for themselves however and I hate to see  potential wasted due to lack of support and political ineptitude and apathy.
lenders.occupational_info: No tengo un gran sentido empresarial pero admiro a la gente que trabaja en situaciones dificiles y odio el gasto de energia  generado por la falta de apoyo y la apatia politica o la corrupcion.

lenders.name: Minh Thien
lenders.loan_because: i need some money for invest in the babe shop
lenders.occupational_info: i am a worker . i earn about 5usd/day . so i need some money to invest in the babe shop to increase my income.

lenders.name: Stephen and Dixie
lenders.loan_because: We can and it makes us feel good helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to share with those less fortunate than myself
lenders.occupational_info: I built a software company and sold it to Cisco, now I work on emerging technology there.

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteering at a charity thrift shop is the best non-paid job a person can have.  It fills your heart.

lenders.name: sheila
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP OTHERS IN DIFFERENT PARTS  OF THE WORLD, WE ARE SUCH A FORTUNATE COUNTRY WE SHOULD ALL DO WHAT WE CAN DO TO HELP OTHERS IN THE WORLD. I  SAW KIVA ON OPRAH-THANK YOU OPRAH FOR SHOWING ME A WAY TO GIVE!!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I OWN MY OWN SWIMMING POOL CLEANING, MAINTENCE, SERVICE.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I had help opening my small business...passing on the favor.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a retired diesel mechanic, working mostly on everything from
aerial boom trucks to diesel cars

lenders.name: Mayra
lenders.loan_because: Nothing makes sense in this life if we can't help each other and share the blessings we've been given.  It feels great to help someone else!

lenders.name: inevitable.cc
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to do well for themselves.

lenders.name: Lor
lenders.loan_because:
Why Not!

We are all one under the planetary umbrella, each of us a part of the whole.

lenders.name: Eric & Staci
lenders.loan_because: we are small business owners ourselves and we know how important it is to have others believe in your dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Staci teaches English as a second language to immigrants of all language backgrounds.  She also writes ESL textbooks. Eric owns and runs  Irish pubs.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: it helps me to appreciate what I have and be grateful that I live where I do.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to be able to help others, see the results immediately and directly!  This is the neatest thing!

lenders.name: Fiona,Isak,Rosa,Kath&Ole
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I have benefitted greatly from people who have provided me with opportunities I otherwise would not have had.  I am honored to do the same for others.

lenders.name: David and Katie
lenders.loan_because: we believe that everyone should be able to follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: David writes software for a company that is turning textbooks into an online format to save students money and cut down on costs. He also started and owns and operates a company that makes websites for start-up businesses, non-profit organizations and churches. Katie is in marketing communications for a large company.

lenders.name: Paige
lenders.loan_because: I want to support growth for small business owners around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small sandwich, bakery and catering company in the heart of thoroughbred horse country.

lenders.name: Dave & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and all our children and grandchildren are healthy and doing well.  We're very thankful!
lenders.occupational_info: He spent many years as a plumbing contractor.  She divided her time between public health nursing and chasing 4 children around.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make someone's dream a reality.

lenders.name: Janet & Ron
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because we feel we have been blessed by God and everyone deserves a chance to make an honest living to provide for themselves or their family. 
We also like knowing where our money is going and who we are helping.

lenders.name: Merry
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up.  I also like seeing the people the money helps.

lenders.name: MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has a choice we can watch or we can help. I choose to help because I want to see people who we help make a difference so they can make a difference themselves. All it takes is a little of ourselves to make things happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with lenders to help people purchase and refinance homes and commercial properties

lenders.name: Harold
lenders.loan_because: If we all helped a little it would make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on highways and roads.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I can ... Can you?

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to invest in those things that will make the change in the world I would want to make.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by these people. It makes me want to go out and start my own business to help others with small businesses in my own neighborhood.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserve help. It feels good to do something for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: My work I thought was difficult at times, until I see how hard and dedicated these people are to work to make a living.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: This is just a small way to give back for all the blessings in my life. There is nothing more gratifying than to lend a helping hand to someone who needs it.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.  I like the idea of helping someone so directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a law enforcement officer for 27 years, I worked in the courts.

lenders.name: Desroches Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help small business owners across the world achieve success !!!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family that travels a lot, and see poverty in many countries.  This is a great way to help, not only monetarily but also by giving people assistance while maintaining their pride !

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: God calls us to help those who need help. I believe Kiva gives honest and hard working people a chance to better their family's future by leveraging the monies of the world for the betterment of society as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach families how to manage their finances in order to improve their quality of life.

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea.  It isn't a hand out, but a hand up.  I'm proud to be involved in these businesses.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: Someone once helped me start a business that supported my family for a number of years.
lenders.occupational_info: I have raised 4 wonderful children and now take care of my home and my husband. I just found out that I am going to be a grandmother!!

lenders.name: Rachelle
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have been born a female in this country and have been given limitless opportunities to succeed.  I feel these loans are an excellent way to help improve the lives of those less fortunate and their future generations.

lenders.name: Kimberly Castillon
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate the hard work and dedication that these people have in order to care for their families. Sometimes we ALL just need a little boost.

lenders.name: mardi
lenders.loan_because:
If I can stop one heart from breaking,
I shall not live in vain;
If I can ease one life the aching,
Or cool one pain,
Or help one fainting robin
Unto his nest again,
I shall not live in vain.

  _______Emily Dickinson

lenders.name: Isabelle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in California, studying Political science with an emphasis in public administration. Someday I would like to work for the UN or another NGO that helps others around the world.

lenders.name: Sandra Mullings Barrett
lenders.loan_because: "Give to him who asks you, and from him who wants to borrow from you do not turn away" (Matthew 5:42). We all have a responsibility to give to those less fortunate than ourselves.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children who are between the ages of 10 to 14 years of age and have special needs.  Also, have been a missionary in Kenya.

lenders.name: Anderson Custom Homes
lenders.loan_because: We believe in giving back to the community.  Kiva is one of the best  websites around to do this!  As business owners, we definately understand the hardships of starting up and we want to help in our own small wayl
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small, family owned construction business specializing in mountain contemporary and cedar log homes.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: Generous, compassionate, wanting to help in any way possible.

lenders.name: RYAN
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and feel blessed to have the life that I do.  I would like to help other people's dreams come true.

lenders.name: Veronica Vallez
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans are a great way to help people around the world and it's an easy way to put my beliefs into action.
lenders.occupational_info: Tech Recruiter

lenders.name: Hector and Barrie
lenders.loan_because: Is better to give than to receive

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I believe that microfinancing can have a huge impact on the lives of people and communities. I invest here in Canada and want to use some of my own wealth to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer, imagineer and facilitator. I help governments, companies and non profits realize their potential as sponsors of innovative enterprises.

lenders.name: Rosalie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because giving is one of the biggest things that makes me feel the happiest.
lenders.occupational_info:
I became a nurse because I wanted to make a difference in the world by helping the sick.  
What I didn’t expect is that I would receive so much more in return.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and I am called to bless others

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to lend a hand to those who are actively trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: It's very rewarding to be able to give of myself either physically or financially.

lenders.name: Mary Ellen Barton
lenders.loan_because: IN MEMORY OF MY DEAR ANYA MEGAHAN - I LOVE AND MISS YOU, PUMPKIN!!!  I HOPE TO SEE YOU AGAIN SOMEDAY...YOU'LL ALWAYS BE MY GIRL.       LOVE, YOUR ELLEN
lenders.occupational_info: I write policy directives for the United States Navy.

lenders.name: Tonja
lenders.loan_because: I do for others what I would want done for me.      "Do not wait for leaders. Do it alone, person to person." - Mother Teresa.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 15/16 year-olds how to read and write.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I respect the people of Peru and enjoyed my visit to several countries in Africa.  I hope I can make a small difference in our world.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I am withdrawing my funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore I am withdrawing my funds and am supporting other more humane organizations

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I makes me feel good to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And it feels sooo good to give.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who need it. I can't afford to loan large amounts by myself and love being able to combine with others to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and editor who loves to use information to educate, inform and entertain.

lenders.name: Iren
lenders.loan_because: There were difficult times in my life when I needed help and I was blessed to receive it.     Now it's my turn to return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a chef who specializes in raw fish.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure computers are secure

lenders.name: Leonard
lenders.loan_because: I just feel that it is encumbent upon us all to make the world a better place, in whatever way we can. The good feeling one gets from helping others is undeniable.
lenders.occupational_info: I am reponsible for the installation of air conditioning and heating systems in commercial buildings

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think that it's important to support someone that wants to try something on their own and support their family, be given a hand up. I would want someone to do the same for me if I needed it!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an international trade law firm. I consult companies on import laws and do a lot of training on U.S. import laws.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of the human race.
lenders.occupational_info:
I go to school for half of the day to become a teacher. 
The rest of the day I work with 5th and 6th graders at a literacy program.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: If I can't open my own business, I want to be able to help someone else succeed with theirs!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a legal secretary in New York City in labor and employment law.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I have access to funds, while many other entrepreneurs don't.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and give something back.

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP A WOMAN HAVE HER DREAM COME TRUE.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Lift a finger, lift the world, one person at a time....

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.occupational_info:
I work no more that 8 days per month, providing extra income for my family.  I dedicate the majority of my time to caring for my 2 children and husband.  I try to be a good citizen and help others when I can.
I consider this an amazing opportunity to lend support to small business owners around the world.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I have beenin business for over 35 years, there is a certain pride in owning and succeding in business, I think it is wonderful that we can give others this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with schools and non profit  groups. youth groups, etc.

"Helping groups reach their goals"

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to give someone a chance to pursue their passion and better the life of their family.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.occupation: Software Sales Consultant, Human Rights Activist
lenders.loan_because: I believe poverty is one of the most important issues of our time and this is a great idea to lift people out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info:
I specialize in enterprise software, which is software used by large businesses and organizations to do their day to day operations.

I also help organize an anti-human-trafficking community group in Washington DC.  For more info about the group, go to www.stopmodernslavery.org.

lenders.name: Coeur
lenders.loan_because: It matters to them, it matters to me! We are all one heart united.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Children's book author that inspire children into positive action by encouraging them to be Angels in Action for others.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Because, overall, it makes the world a smaller, better place to live.

lenders.name: Elesa
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to learn about the world and be a participant in change that works.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We can really only help the people who want to help themselves. I am happy to see people who are trying to better their situation and am more than happy to lend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people save money & make money to plan for their future. Goal setting is key, most people don't plan to fail, they just fail to plan. I help people get to where they want to be.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe most people will succeed, if we can find a way to give them a chance.

lenders.name: Linda Sanders
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe that this is the way to change the world, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I did many things before retiring; I was a probation officer, a social worker, a loan officer and owned a restaurant.

lenders.name: Deborah & Leigh
lenders.loan_because: We want our grandchildren Anthony, Nico, Seaonna, Emma, Sonja, Vincent and Lily to live in a world that helps people up and have hope.

lenders.name: Jewel
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give back and helps all of us on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a leadership and life coach helping women to set and achieve their goals. I help people and organizations to develop their potential.

lenders.name: ANNA
lenders.loan_because: I loan because maybe one day I will need help and somebody will find me and help me. Another reason is that I want to fight poverty and maybe this little thing bring a smile to  a person in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a housekeeper.I don't make a big money ,but I feel that there are always people who have less than I do  who struggle every single day to survive .

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: This world needs to give "Mercy" and to recieve. I am able to do both here. Do the right thing....Pay it forward....There but for the Grace of God go I....
lenders.occupational_info: Grandmother, Mom & Wife...Part time Yoga Inspiration to others and random acts of kindness woman.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference and that 'what goes around, comes around' is true.  This organization allows the average person, with average resources, to make an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student, a mother and also work part time in social service field.  I donate to Kiva in honor of all the kids in my family! Especially my nephew Joshua, who I am holding in the photo.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed all my life. This is my way to make a little difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Not my dream job but I have a good salary that allows me to do what I need to do.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: as a small business person myself, I know how much time and dedication it takes to run a sucessful business. Also, it makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time freelance photographer. I make most of my income from weddings, portraiture, and commercial work such as photographing boquets and cakes(yum!) for wedding magazines. I also photograph the restaurants that are reviewed for my local newspaper.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I believe that when each of us succeeds, we all are blessed.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: Girls are uneducated and women are marginalized in large parts of this world, and it’s not an accident that these countries are disproportionately mired in poverty and ripped apart by fundamentalism and chaos. There’s a growing recognition among everyone from the World Bank to the U.S. military’s Joint Chiefs of Staff to Aid Organizations that focusing on women and girls is the most effective way to fight global poverty and extremism. Foreign aid is increasingly directed to women because the world is awakening to a powerful truth: Women and girls are the solution!

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable hard-working people to better their living conditions,  letting them know others care about their plight.

lenders.name: Anastasia
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help people directly.  I have a small business and know what a struggle it can sometimes be.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to sew.  My specialty is historic clothing, but I make all kinds.  I work as a volunteer to local theatre groups and sew for my children, grandchildren and friends.

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone in need.  I am so glad that I am fortunate enough to be able to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I program computer software to support a manufacturing business

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to give.  It is a win win

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It is time to give new starts to people
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer @ Cuyahoga Valley Art Center

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired , and a homemaker.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to help someone in need.

lenders.name: Vicki and Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to show thanks for the opportunities I have been given because people trusted me.  I took $100 from my first student loan to loan to someone else for the next year.  I am so glad I found a way to help that doesn't have a religious or political backing.  Go team Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am 44 years old and just got my undergraduate degree and begun my own business.  It is never too late to get an education and change your life.  That first $100 for Kiva has been recycled over and over, much to my delight - one of the best investments I've ever made.

lenders.name: Rhea Lynn & Ryder
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I have the life that I do. I would like to try to help others in countries where the opportunites are few and far between.

lenders.name: Emmy
lenders.loan_because: I really want to "help those who help themselves" and this seems to be a beautiful way to accomplish that.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired mother of four and now realizing a new career as someone who takes care of nature's little plants at home and protects the lives of swimmers at a local pool. I just got my Red Cross lifeguard certificate this year!

lenders.name: Darrell & Kris
lenders.loan_because: We lead a blessed life and want to provide others with the same opportunity to achieve their aspirations and dreams.

lenders.name: thomas& maggie
lenders.loan_because: Its chance to make a differance form home
lenders.occupational_info:
Operate a people mover
 Wife helps people in need

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I care about people getting a fresh start and a chance to better their lives.

lenders.name: J. S. V.
lenders.loan_because: Such a small sacrifice on my part can have a huge impact on the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: pastor at a small parish in the mountains of West Virginia

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: you can't get along in life without a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: lucky

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Blessings given are blessing received. Love thy neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: I do not work at this time due to health limitations.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people grow into their own.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: these people work harder than most people and i can help them reach economic independence.
lenders.occupational_info: read, write, think, research (not necessarily in that order)

lenders.name: Wellness4theworld
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting the greater good, I believe that we need to support our community at a soul level, I believe that the more we give, the more we heal ourselves and the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I practice healing arts with women in children around the world. I practice in North America and Southeast Asia (mainly Thailand) my husband and I are in the process of building an eco-healing center/birthing center in Northern Thailand.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in so many ways that I feel it's my responsibility to give back.

lenders.name: Betty & Jim
lenders.loan_because: To give a little help to our friends in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: That we may serve.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I like to make a difference

lenders.name: Ron & Karla
lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs ourselves, we know the challenges of starting your own business and then making it grow.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell products and goods wholesale.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: It is a gift in itself to give to someone in need.  My hopes and dreams are that by my small contributions I am able to positively affect another person's life thus triggering good throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I review and document business processes looking for opportunities for optimization and automation (less steps = less time = less financial output = more money saved or earned)

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: Passing it on ....

lenders.name: Irene & Mark
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help from time to time, if we can help someone achieve their dream it's payback for all the times someone has helped us through life.
lenders.occupational_info: Irene works for a health care company and Mark is a fabricator at Glacier Bay in Union City.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all of the support that I have received myself and want to show my gratitude by passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and ship custom embroidered baby gifts all around the World.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I admire those who strive to lift themselves up and work independently.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
I can't do much, but I can make it a little easier for someone else.
It is even more important to me now because I have been laid off from my great paying job, and live in a place with 13% unemployment, the future looks tough for me, but not as difficult as the people who KIVA loans help.
lenders.occupational_info: It only takes a minute, a small step, to do SOMETHING.  This is not a hand out, this is a helping hand.

lenders.name: Khalil and Fatim
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I would like to make an effort to bring positive change in people’s life whenever possible.

lenders.name: Hallie
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I am very fortunate in my life and this little bit that I can do to help is good.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean in a church 3 times a week and help an elderly women one day a week.  It helps supplement the family income and allows me to see my kids off to school and be home when they get home from school.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves to be successful in their work.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach ballet and Hawaiian hula dance and my husband and I rebuild old homes in Oklahoma City Oklahoma.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help those who want to help themselves and their families. How can you not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Dialysis Laboratory that tests the blood of over 100,000 patients with Kidney Disease. I work every day so that others can have a better tomorrow.

lenders.name: elda
lenders.loan_because: Its good to share.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involve alot of studying and i`m doing what i got to do.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by a recent Oprah Winfrey Show.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at Emmaus High School.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the women of the world.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help. I found kiva through a friend of mine and was convinced by the idea of kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer in Düsseldorf, Germany. I'm employed at a big company. Most of the time I care for the legal cases of the company, provide legal advice to the board of directors, the emploees and external partners.

lenders.name: khadija
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Francesca
lenders.loan_because: I have a business and it feel great. So I wanted someone else to get that same feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I love making people feel beautiful inside and out. It is the best job in the world.

lenders.name: Jacquelyn
lenders.loan_because: Adversity does not build character, it reveals it.  I just want to help and this seems to be the best way.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am looking for a job but I am not in dire straights; Kiva gives me hope for a better world...

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I had been looking for a way to have my money work for others...
lenders.occupational_info: I sell new homes

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I started a small business, and I understand the need for capital.

lenders.name: Phil and Kim
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those in need to better themselves and therfore provide a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Military/Real Estate Financing

lenders.name: Chyrll
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me above all I could ever have imagined through the help of others. I now want to pass on what help I can give to someone who really needs it. This is the gift that keeps on giving, touching not only this present generation, but future generations as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after many years of being an administrative assistant. Now I take care of my husband and our home. I enjoy Precept Bible Studies. As time permits, I sew clothes for babies and young children. Also I enjoy working in my little flower garden.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: The money is going to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It is an incredible opportunity to improve a stranger's life in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and designer. I use mostly recycled materials like old record albums, recycled paper and salvaged wood. I like to find beauty in things that other people overlook.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: serving human dignity is everyone's responsibility.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: It's wonderful to feel you've made a direct contribution to helping a real person rather than just give money to some organization and never know if anyone truly benefited.

lenders.name: Karri
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to empower others to support themselves. I have been blessed in my life and feel that I should give back and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a fundraising company that helps non-profit organizations raise money for their causes.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: my parents are both from Vietnam & I have seen firsthand the power of the wills of some of the world's poorest people.  Many people in 3rd world countries want so badly to make their lives better & would endure any hardship that comes but have no means to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time law student and I hope to use my degrees to make a real difference in the world, especially concerning international human rights.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important to help others advance their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their overall health.

lenders.name: kristen
lenders.occupation: assistant to real estate agent / substitute teach
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!  It's as simple as that!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist a real estate agent in the buying and selling of homes.  I also fill in for teachers at school when they need time off.

lenders.name: Denae
lenders.loan_because: together with other lenders I can help people across the world help themselves

lenders.name: Jaclyn
lenders.loan_because: The sales in my profession have been in a downward slump for some time now.  As of recent, I've noticed that it has been starting to take an emotional toll on me.  I didn't want to sit around and feel sorry for myself!  I thought that maybe if I helped someone in need, it would help me to feel better about my situation.  And it definitely did!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell new homes in the Chicagoland area.

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.loan_because: Because I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who works primarily for businesses.

lenders.name: Tanisha
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed for my opportunities.  I want to help others.

lenders.name: Antoine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro credit
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that analyzes specific companies, how they are doing and how they could do better

lenders.name: Levi & Mandy
lenders.loan_because: We have been given beyond our needs and are called to give.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much and coming from a 3rd world country I understand the needs of the people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with sellers and buyers of homes and land, assisting them in fulfilling their real estate needs, wants and desires.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: With Kiva you can really make a difference in somebody's life!

lenders.name: Mavis
lenders.loan_because: it is a more personal way to contribute to the success of small entreprises in developing countries especially those managed by women.
lenders.occupational_info: As an officer of the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA) I plan and manage development  projects.

lenders.name: Suzon
lenders.loan_because: the world is a small place and each of these people is my neighbor trying to make a bit of it better.
lenders.occupational_info: instrumental in getting new medical devices approved for sale in the global marketplace after ensuring their safety and efficacy.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lenders.name: G,S&g
lenders.loan_because: of the impact it creates in our world - spread the love -
lenders.occupational_info: G - is a chef and director of food service / S - runs the community shared agricultural program and gardens for a non-profit / g - is our 19 year old son who goes to school, plays music and enjoys his life

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in women and know we can do anything we set our minds to do.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to give service to those in need.  I salute those who take the initiative to invest in their own destiny by starting a business. It is very rewarding to see people succeed. As a human being we all have the responsibility to serve, share and help others whenever we are able.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to help families buy and sell homes. It is rewarding to be able to help someone move on to their next adventure in their new home.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to have the desire to suceed but lack the funds to move forward.
lenders.occupational_info: My sister and I have a small embroidery business. We embroider company logos on promotional items. We also make handmade vests, jackets etc. As well we have a contract to sew binding on window valances.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs to be loved
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Photographer, I take pictures of weddings, parties and people. I also sell art work.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secretary for a local police department.

lenders.name: Alin
lenders.loan_because: While not rich by any means I am very blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: My occupation pretty much describes itself.

lenders.name: Tera

lenders.occupational_info: I dispatch State Troopers to calls for help that come in.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: empowering women by giving them the diginity of changing their situation themselves is much more powerful a gift than pllain charity

lenders.name: Emi
lenders.loan_because: I receive a monthly income so I am able to lend money to people who can use it to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: To educate myself and others about the world we all live in and to try to help others who need it.

lenders.name: Amber Kamdar-Sharif
lenders.loan_because:
someone gave me a chance and now I want to give that chance to someone else!
Thank you Oprah!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 6th grade English...

lenders.name: Ambracia
lenders.loan_because: Its my duty as an American to use my blessings to help others.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell new homes.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.occupational_info: I teach business and computers to students 14-18 years old during the day.  I play music and perform during the evening.

lenders.name: CHERYL
lenders.loan_because: I started my company on a shoestring and admire these people who are willing to work to make a better life for them and people they love.
lenders.occupational_info:
Selling and managing property that makes an income for the owners.
Also write a business column for a newspaper

lenders.name: dana
lenders.loan_because: it is my priviledge and honor to help those who want to help themselves. everyone deserves a chance to thrive. i have worked hard and have been blessed and feel very fortunate to be in a position to lend to others.
lenders.occupational_info: i make ads for major movies

lenders.name: Brandy Kariuki
lenders.loan_because: It is important to to reach out to someone in need and to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: My job and passion is to assist people looking for work.  A good majority of the individuals that I help are low income or from third world countries.  I find joy and satisfaction in helping people find independance and stability.

lenders.name: Floyd & Barbara Blamires
lenders.loan_because: It's a feel good thing to know that you have helped make positive difference in someone's life style for their family.

lenders.loan_because: I hope that it helps improve the quality of life for people
lenders.occupational_info: Employing good people, treating them fairly and with respect all through their lives.

lenders.loan_because: I enjoy many blessings and I delight in being able to help others live in a world of plenty
lenders.occupational_info: I own several small businesses:  web stores, home service business, Skateboard manufacturer.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: 34. "A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another. 35. By this all men will know that you are my disciples, if you love one another." John 13:34-35
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites. I am retired law-enforcement and now work from my home. I also have an online gift shop.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.occupational_info: I make and fit external braces (leg, spine, arms) and artificial limbs.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: the world is a globe not an empire
lenders.occupational_info: I bring together people who think differently about the same issue and help them find what they have in common

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I have far more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell homes and property... compared with most people in the world, I don't work at all.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: even a little bit goes a long way. Numerous people have helped me in my lifetime, now it is my turn to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager of a family owned French bakery and bistro and couldn't love my job more!

lenders.name: Lauren and Family
lenders.loan_because: My family and I feel very strongly about social welfare, both in the United States and abroad.  It is encouraging to see so many people giving so much to people abroad.  We are lucky as Americans to have so much and not even know it.  It is amazing how foregoing a dinner out at a restaurant can help someone thousands of miles away fund an entire business!
lenders.occupational_info: Currently in residency training at UCSD in San Diego, CA and my family and I are enjoying life in southern California.

lenders.name: Gary and Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It's something that my Dad and I do together to help other families.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are excited to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help inform students and parents about higher education, specifically for the university I work for, the University of St. Thomas

lenders.name: Alejandra
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to give my mom something that she would really like on her birthday.  I also hope to learn the importance of helping others and making this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: eating, sleeping, growing, learning and making my family very happy.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone realize a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I.m  retired housewife.  Mother of 5 still dabbling in photography and still in demand to photograph events, church activities, family reunions etc.

lenders.name: Brad & Elaine
lenders.loan_because: We hope that we can help.

lenders.name: Sarah Smile
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to have been able to start and grow my business and want to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home décor designer. See what makes me smile...

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people grow and succeeed.  I also loan in remembrance of my father, who passed away last year.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the National Special Needs Trust department.  Our department takes care of trust accounts that have been set up for people with special needs.  It is rewarding to work with those that overcome so many challenges on a daily basis.  They are inspirations.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mom working to support my son. I would like to help other women do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote the products my company sells.

lenders.name: Rob & Lynette
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others get a good start in life.

lenders.name: Emilia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should try to extend a helping hand when they can.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is better than regular charity, it empowers people!
lenders.occupational_info: Always getting our man... :)

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: After watching a show on "Oprah" and seeing what difference this made, I also  wanted to make a difference in someone life
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very Interesting and challenging. To see someone being able to buy their first home is a reward in itself.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: everyone should do it

lenders.name: Robert & Maddy
lenders.loan_because: of the golden rule.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I want to see if one person can really make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell high school level books about architecture and drafting.

lenders.occupational_info: I train thoroughbred race horses.

lenders.name: Dianna
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is the greatest personal satisfaction for me.
lenders.occupational_info: Being a mother is the most challenging and rewarding job I'ver ever had. I also am on call for the schools to work with students, which I feel blessed to be able to do.

lenders.name: wanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others, - anything is possible.  Be the change.
lenders.occupational_info: Support women and children in crisis.

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: a leg up in life is better than a hand out!

lenders.name: Elesha & Mike
lenders.loan_because: "Because I have been given much, I too much give" are the lines of one of my favorite hymns.  My husband and I are greatly blessed and Kiva gives us opportunities to help others in need.  After recent visits to South Africa and another planned with our children in 2008, we know how blessed we are and want to help others when possible.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike and I are involved in the selling of products and adminstration of these programs and finances of the business. Mike sells furniture in a retail outlet and I am the VP of a Equipment Manufacturing Company.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I lend because I would want someone to lend to me if I needed it.  I think many honest people are taken advantage of by other people and I want to try to help someone do what they can do to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to write screenplays that producers will like and buy from me so that they can make them into feature-length films.

lenders.name: Milt & Betty
lenders.loan_because: I'ts the right thing to do when we are so blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyone has their duty to do their part, no matter how smalll

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: To help along the entrepreneurial spirit of people who are obviously trying to better their situation, but sometimes do not have the same opportunities to fulfill that spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Steel fence construction. Welding and fabrication

lenders.name: Erika Villegas
lenders.loan_because: i know that many of these people need this one opportunity to make a difference in their life and their families.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur for many years, I realize the balance between hard work, dedication and inspired ideas along with the need for capital.  I'd like to be in a position to help those where capital is non-existent, especially the women.
lenders.occupational_info: I promote travel to Tanzania through luxury safari vacations, which support the local economy and help foster an appreciation for Africa's wildlife.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I want to take advantage of the sustainable and affordable opportunities we have to connect with and help each other globally
lenders.occupational_info: Apart from going to school, I give city tours of Ottawa as a guide on a double decker bus.

lenders.name: chantal
lenders.loan_because: when i needed someone to help me, i had friends who readed out and without them i wouldn't be where i am today. so all i want to to do is help others to reach for their dreams when they need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies build web sites, mostly large newspaper and tv media companies.

lenders.name: Christie and Steve
lenders.loan_because: We both love the idea of helping other people around the world achieving a loan so that they can help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Christie is a Speech Therapist who helps mostly elderly people re-learn to talk, eat, and think more clearly after they've had some medical problems.

Steve is a dispatcher for the trucking industry to move shipments around North America smoothly.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
helping a woman improves her, her family,
her town, region, country and the world.

We are in this together; each of us should give help, no matter how small it seems.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to increase access to the equity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I start important conversations between companies and customers.

lenders.name: dona
lenders.loan_because: i believe one step at a time can change the world

lenders.name: Mellony
lenders.loan_because: I like to make others happy and I like to help people make their dreams come true. If I had more I would give more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Crosby County in the Courthouse. I pay the county bills and do the payroll for several employees. I also help the auditor with the county budget. I work 40 hours a week at the courthouse, and spend the rest of my time at home with my husband, or doing things for my grandkids. My husband is David. He is a police officer. I have five children that are grown, and six grandchildren. We have two dogs for pets. Their names are Bosley and Kylie.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of anything better to do than to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a research scientist and I work on Mycobacterium tuberculosis.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to

lenders.name: Aud

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I get everything I want from my parents and I just wanted to help someone who didn't have a mom or dad who could give them everything they wanted or needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work yet.  I am in the 5th grade at school.  But I do get good grades .

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I have the means to do so, and because of the impact it makes.
lenders.occupational_info: help organizations and businesses run more efficiently and effectively

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of giving a hand up and that people feel better about themselves and their situations when they can support themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Reginald
lenders.loan_because: because it feels good. There is no better feeling than helping someone harness their desires
lenders.occupational_info: I assist persons on acquiring homes, starting businesses, taking trips and just starting over in life. I try to bring smiles to people faces.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to change the world one random act of kindness at a time. I can afford to help and so I will do whatever I can to help those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother of two. My husband is active duty U.S. Air Force.

lenders.name: pat
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.  It is a selfish act that makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Lynnea
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help. I cant wait to see the businesses grow and I will be cheering them on from my computer.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange loans and sell insurance products from a car dealership.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: This is a good thing to do...it feels great to give.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I love putting my money to use where it is most effective, and where I can see it working.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: It is money that I won't miss but will change the very life of another person.  That person will impact the lives of their family who will inturn impact their community.  It's amazing to think of the ripple effect a Kiva microloan will have.
lenders.occupational_info: I help non-profits accept electronic forms of payment.

lenders.name: Agustin
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed and want to enable someone else to better their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a tourism bureau, promoting our destination to visitors.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I have always been taught to give.   I think this is an excellent opportunity to give to people around the world to help better their situation in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my husband and son and our home.

lenders.name: Jaden and Beckett
lenders.loan_because: We all need to do what we can to make the world a better place for all.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own and run a small Inn and restaurant

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I have the means and the desire to help people who are deserving. I love the concept of allowing someone to provide for themselves or their family with a small donation. I hope the money that I loan to these people will enable them to someday help someone else who is in need.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed to be able to do so.

lenders.name: Tre` & Dave
lenders.loan_because: We live a very blessed life and are so thankful for that. Therefore, we want to lend a hand to those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Jenifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world...this is how I can help now.
lenders.occupational_info: 12+ years of experience in communications through community and public relations, branding strategies, and social media & technology.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a life and that lending helps both the giver and receiver and helps create a world commuinity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help  inviduals and organizations develop in order to be healthier. I manage many conflicts.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: We are not put on this earth merely to take care of ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping customers keep their computer networks secure from outside intruders.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my daughter and our home.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I  have a small art business - "peace by piece" - I design and create stained glass windows. Half of my proceeds are pledged to peaceful efforts. Promoting stable families helps to promote stable communities and supports peace in the area.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher - 5th grade - teaching language arts and fine arts. I try to model peaceful efforts for my students, in hopes that they will join in these efforts.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I'm committed to helping another person create a better life for themselves and their community around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a counselor that helps people seeking to find ways to help themselves for a better life.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to operate a small business so if I can reach across the world to help in some small way then I do !
lenders.occupational_info: craft person. I make ribbon flowers by hand to sell at craft fairs and shops(very small business)

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that doing something this small can make a huge difference.  Without a loan, my husband and I would have never been able to start our business and it gives me great joy to know that we can do that for someone else.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is a fabulous way to give a leg up to someone who is in need.

lenders.name: Dawn Suiter
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get started with a small business.  I also know it can be done with even small amounts of money.  I want to help pay it forward and give others the opportunity to make their world a better place.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant for a software firm in the US.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: We are in this world to serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing Manager for my family's manufacturing company

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.occupation: Co-Owner of Boutique Real Estate & Hm Financing Co
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting my husband's dream. Office work, I wear many hats to keep our office running; Loan Processing and Transaction Coordinating - LOTS of paperwork!

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student working to become a counselor.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to live in a country where it seems that most anything is possible.  I love that Kiva allows me to provide people in developing areas with the tools they need to create their own opportunities through growing their own businesses.  Giving people a hand up is simply the right thing to do and it's very rewarding!
lenders.occupational_info: As a Realtor, I help people in Las Vegas, Nevada ,USA to buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: To give a hand up to people less lucky than me.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell test preparation software to schools and school systems.

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should all help each other. I believe this is God's plan for each and everyone of us, reach out and give to one another.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I want to promote growth which is  sustainable economically, socially and environmentally and Kiva's bottom up approach allows this to be done easily, collaboratively and effectively.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Internet connectivity strategist and learning network consultant.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I feel is our duty to help our fellow man in need.  This website provides an amazing opportunity to do so.

lenders.name: kasey
lenders.loan_because: A little can do a lot!!!

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in my life. I appreciate this opportunity to share these blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran pastor. I lead a congregation in Illinois, and I spend my days planning programs, preparing worship services, teaching and visiting members of my church.

lenders.name: Kenn
lenders.occupation: Electrical, Plumbing, HV AC, CIS and also CWC

lenders.name: Chris Moerles
lenders.loan_because: Because it's so simple to do, and the money comes back to me to help others.

lenders.name: Nneka
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed enough to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with the ethics problems in a hospital.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: It takes a village!
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to people and try to help them figure out solutions to their worries.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.occupational_info: medical research for neurological diseases

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I've been so blessed to be able to open my own business in the USA and earn a good living for myself.  I've been looking for a small way to  bring that good fortune to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for drug companies who are trying to make new medicines. I travel to different doctors' offices and make sure they are keeping the people who try these new medicines safe.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve a better life through helping them help themselves

lenders.name: Theia
lenders.loan_because: As a single mother of 3 teen-aged sons, God has blessed and allowed me to provide a comfortable lifestyle for the four of us. I am probably one paycheck away from poverty myself but it is due to my own fault and carelessness. I waste plenty of my money on frivolous things and have always wanted to make a difference where it was needed the most and would be appreciated. With the minimum of $25.00 a real difference and change for others across the world is possible.  When I saw Kiva on Oprah I knew this was IT!  A perfect way to give back. I knew that I didn't have millions like Bill Clinton, Agassi, nor Oprah, however, $25.00 now and a little more later, yes! It is our purpose in life to help one another to make this world a better place for all. I thank God, Oprah, and Kiva for the opportunity to do my part world-wide!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting on an orthopaedic surgical unit. I am an integral part of helping patients regain their physical strength, mobility, and pain management. Normally, the days are 12-16 hours long. Most days it is mentally and physically challenging due to the racism and prejudices that face America. Other days it rewarding to see the smiles and gratitude of the patients / family member's lives myself and my co-workers have touched by restoring optimal health and a safe return home for them regardless of the obstacles faced.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help facilitate success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am living abroad with my husband and helping keep things organized in our home. I also do volunteer work in the community and love to travel.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: To give someone a chance to improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I create artwork for businesses, the artwork helps them to sell their product.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I believe showing faith in humanity raises us all up.
lenders.occupational_info: I am dedicated to helping women and their families have healthy and beautiful birth experiences.
